name: Unbounce
description: Unbounce is a no-code platform for building, testing, and optimizing high-converting landing pages to boost leads and sales.
longDescription: Unbounce is a Canadian software company founded in 2009, specializing in a drag-and-drop landing page builder designed for marketers and businesses to create conversion-focused campaigns without coding expertise. Its mission is to empower users to grow leads, sales, and signups by providing AI-powered tools that simplify page creation and optimization. The platform serves solo marketers, agencies, and enterprises across industries, offering seamless integrations with marketing tools like Salesforce and HubSpot. By leveraging AI insights, Unbounce helps users launch personalized landing pages, popups, and sticky bars that maximize conversion rates. It also provides educational resources and a supportive community to help users achieve marketing success.
features: The drag-and-drop builder enables users to create customized landing pages quickly without coding skills.
Smart Traffic uses AI to direct visitors to the landing page variant most likely to convert based on their behavior.
A/B testing functionality allows users to create and test multiple page variants to optimize conversion rates.
Over 100 customizable templates provide industry-specific designs optimized for high conversions.
Smart Copy generates AI-driven marketing copy to enhance landing page content and save time.
Popups and sticky bars engage visitors with targeted offers to increase lead generation.
Seamless integrations with tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zapier streamline marketing workflows.
Conversion benchmarks powered by machine learning compare page performance against industry standards.
SSL encryption ensures all landing pages are secure, boosting visitor trust.
Mobile-friendly designs automatically adapt pages for optimal viewing on any device.
Free hosting is included for all landing pages created on Unbounce plans.
The WordPress plugin allows users to publish landing pages directly to their WordPress sites.

faqs.question: What is Unbounce used for?
faqs.answer: Unbounce is used to create, test, and optimize landing pages, popups, and sticky bars to increase leads, sales, and conversions for marketing campaigns.

faqs.question: Does Unbounce offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Unbounce does not have a permanent free plan but offers a 14-day free trial to test its features.

faqs.question: Can I use Unbounce without coding skills?
faqs.answer: Yes, Unbounceâ€™s no-code drag-and-drop builder allows anyone to create professional landing pages without coding expertise.

faqs.question: Does Unbounce support A/B testing?
faqs.answer: Yes, Unbounce provides built-in A/B testing tools to create and compare page variants for better conversion rates.

faqs.question: How does Smart Traffic work?
faqs.answer: Smart Traffic uses AI to analyze visitor behavior and automatically directs them to the landing page variant most likely to convert.

faqs.question: Can Unbounce integrate with other marketing tools?
faqs.answer: Unbounce integrates with popular tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zapier to enhance marketing workflows.

faqs.question: Are Unbounce landing pages mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, all Unbounce landing pages are automatically optimized for mobile devices to ensure a seamless user experience.

faqs.question: Is SSL security included with Unbounce pages?
faqs.answer: Unbounce provisions SSL certificates for custom domains on paid plans, ensuring secure HTTPS pages.

faqs.question: Can I use Unbounce for multiple clients?
faqs.answer: Yes, Unbounce supports multiple domains or subdomains, making it ideal for agencies managing client campaigns.

faqs.question: What support does Unbounce offer?
faqs.answer: Unbounce provides an award-winning customer success team, educational resources, and a community for user support.
